about.description: Hello! I'm David Pessoa, Software Developer, Computer Science graduate from Mackenzie Presbyterian University and Electronics Technician from Liceu de Artes e Ofícios de São Paulo.
about.aspirations: I aim to work as a Software Engineer, improving my skills in web, software and mobile applications, while gaining experience in software architecture, project management.

resume.title: My Experiences

20DASH.description: I currently work as a web developer at 20DASH, contributing to both back-end and front-end development. On the back-end, I collaborate on system development using tools such as AWS Lambda and Chalice. For integrations and PostgreSQL database manipulation, I use libraries like SQLAlchemy and Alembic. On the front-end, I develop user interfaces using React.js

elevential.description: During my internship at Elevential, I worked as a Python programmer contributing to a project with Django framework and integrated with a PostgreSQL database for database management. Additionally, I contributed to front-end development using Javascript and the Bootstrap framework

mackleaps.description: In 2023, I worked as a volunteer at Mackleaps Junior Company to develop the front-end (using HTML, CSS, Javascript and React.js) of a web application to display weather data from stations located on the Mackenzie campus
